name: Neil Armstrong
what_did:
Armstrong was the first human to walk on the Moon in 1969.
He flew the Apollo 11 mission and said the famous words, 'That’s one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind.'
He trained as a test pilot before becoming an astronaut.
why_matters:
Armstrong showed that humans could travel beyond Earth.
His Moon landing was a huge moment in space history.
He inspired people to dream big and reach for the stars.
